</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage87"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS; WIDTH:595.3PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-VARIANT:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI, ARIAL, SANS-SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:8PT;">
<A STYLE="TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;COLOR:#003366;" HREF="#T1601284_10K_HTM_TOC">
	TABLE OF CONTENTS
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:46PT;MARGIN-LEFT:70PT;WIDTH:456PT;">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Majesco
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Notes to Consolidated and Combined
<BR>
	Financial Statements
<BR>
	(All amounts are in thousands of US Dollars except per share data and as stated otherwise)
<BR>
	&#8199;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	16
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:435.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYEE STOCK OPTION PLAN&#8201;continued
<BR>
	&#8199;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:1PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	In June&nbsp;2015, Majesco adopted the Majesco 2015 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#8220;2015 Plan&#8221;). Options and stock awards for the purchase of up to 3,877,263 shares may be granted by the Board of Directors to our employees, consultants and directors at an exercise or grant price determined by the Board of Directors on the date of grant. Options may be granted as incentive or nonqualified stock options with a term of not more than ten years. The 2015 Plan allows the Board of Directors to grant restricted or unrestricted stock awards or awards denominated in stock equivalent units or any combination of the foregoing and may be paid in common stock or other securities, in cash, or in a combination of common stock or other securities and cash. On March&nbsp;31, 2016, an aggregate of 1,697,878 shares were available for grant under the 2015 Plan.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	Majesco uses the Black-Scholes-Merton option-pricing model (&#8220;Black-Scholes&#8221;) to measure fair value of the share-based awards. The Black-Scholes model requires us to make significant judgments regarding the assumptions used within the model, the most significant of which are the expected stock price volatility, the expected life of the option award, the risk-free interest rate of return and dividends during the expected term.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:7.59PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	&#8226;
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:7.59PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	Expected volatilities are based on peer entities as the historical volatility of Majesco&#8217;s common stock is limited.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:7.79PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	&#8226;
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:7.79PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	In accordance with SAB Topic 14, Majesco uses the simplified method for estimating the expected term when measuring the fair value of employee stock options using the Black-Scholes option pricing model. Majesco believes the use of the simplified method is appropriate due to the employee stock options qualifying as &#8220;plain-vanilla&#8221; options under the criteria established by SAB Topic 14.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:7.79PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	&#8226;
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:7.79PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The risk-free interest rate for periods within the contractual life of the option is based on the U.S. Treasury yields for an equivalent term at the time of grant.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:7.79PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	&#8226;
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:7.79PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	Majesco does not anticipate paying dividends during the expected term.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:14PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	As of March&nbsp;31, 2016, there was $1,461 of total unrecognized compensation costs related to non-vested share-based compensation arrangements previously granted by Majesco. That cost is expected to be recognized over a weighted-average period of 3.1 years.

</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING:0PT;PADDING-LEFT:18.81PT;WIDTH:0PT;">
	&#8203;

	&#8203;

<TD COLSPAN="3">
	&#8203;

</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:16.98PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;">
	The Black-Scholes option valuation model was developed for use in estimating the fair value of traded options which have no vesting restrictions and are fully transferable. In addition, option valuation models require the input of highly subjective assumptions including the expected stock price volatility. Because our employee stock options have characteristics significantly different from those of traded options, and because changes in the subjective input assumptions can materially affect the fair value estimate, in management&#8217;s opinion, the existing models do not necessarily provide a reliable single measure of the fair value of our employee stock options.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;">
	The Group follows FASB Accounting Standards Codification (&#8220;ASC&#8221;) 718, Accounting for Stock Options and Other Stock-Based Compensation. Among other items, ASC 718 requires companies to record the compensation expense for share-based awards issued to employees and directors in exchange for services provided. The amount of the compensation expense is based on the estimated fair value of the awards on their grant dates and is recognized over the required service periods. Our share-based awards include stock options and restricted stock awards. For restricted stock awards, the calculation of compensation expense under ASC 718 is based on the intrinsic value of the grant.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Notes to Consolidated and Combined
<BR>
	Financial Statements
<BR>
	(All amounts are in thousands of US Dollars except per share data and as stated otherwise)

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:16.98PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On September&nbsp;11, 2012, Cover-All entered into a Loan and Security Agreement (&#8220;Loan Agreement&#8221;) by and among Imperium Commercial Finance Master Fund, LP, a Delaware limited partnership (&#8220;Imperium&#8221;), as lender, Cover-All Systems, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Cover-All (the &#8220;Subsidiary&#8221;), as borrower, and Cover-All as guarantor. The Loan Agreement provided for a three-year term loan to the Subsidiary of&#8201; $2,000,000 and a three-year revolving credit line to the Subsidiary of up to $250,000, evidenced by a Revolving Credit Note in favor of Imperium (together with the Term Note, the &#8220;Imperium Notes&#8221;). Prior to the merger with Majesco, Cover-All paid in full the balance of the Imperium Notes.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	In connection with the Loan Agreement, Cover-All issued to Imperium a five-year warrant (the &#8220;Stock Purchase Warrant&#8221;) to purchase 1,400,000 shares of Cover-All&#8217;s common stock at an exercise price of&#8201; $1.48 per share. Cover-All also issued five-year warrants (the &#8220;Monarch Warrants&#8221;) to purchase 42,000 shares, in the aggregate, of Cover-All&#8217;s common stock at an exercise price of&#8201; $1.48 per share, to Monarch Capital Group, LLC (&#8220;Monarch&#8221;), which acted as Cover-All&#8217;s financial adviser in connection with the loan transaction, and an officer of Monarch. The Stock Purchase Warrants became exercisable on the date of the merger of Cover-All with Majesco. These issued and outstanding warrants to purchase shares of Cover-All common stock were not exercised or cancelled prior to the merger and were assumed by Majesco in accordance with their terms on the same terms and conditions as were applicable to such warrants immediately prior to the merger, with the number of shares subject to, and the exercise price applicable to, such warrants being appropriately adjusted based on the exchange ratio of 0.21641.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On September&nbsp;1, 2015, Majesco issued to Maxim Partners LLC a five year warrant to purchase 25,000 shares of common stock of Majesco at an exercise price of&#8201; $7.00 per share. The warrant was issued in connection with the engagement of the holder to perform certain advisory services to the Group. The number of shares issuable upon exercise of the warrant may be reduced under certain circumstances of non-performance under the services agreement. The warrant may be exercised at any time after September&nbsp;1, 2016 and will expire, if unexercised, on September&nbsp;1, 2020. The warrant contains certain anti-dilution adjustment protection in case of certain future issuances of securities, stock dividends, split and other transactions affecting Majesco&#8217;s securities. The holder of the warrant is entitled to piggyback registration rights in case of certain registered securities offerings by Majesco.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">

	&#8203;

	$

</TD>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:11.39PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	MSSIPL entered into an operating lease for its operation facilities in Mahape, India, as lessee, with Majesco Limited, Majesco&#8217; s parent company, as lessor. The approximate aggregate annual rent payable to Majesco Limited under this lease agreement is expected to be $1,218. The lease is effective June&nbsp;1, 2015 and expires on May 31, 2020.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	MSSIPL also entered into a lease for facilities for its operations in Pune, India, with Mastek Ltd. as lessor. The approximate aggregate annual rent payable to Mastek Ltd. under this lease agreement is expected to be $289. The lease is effective June&nbsp;1, 2015 and expires on May 31, 2020.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:15.79PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	Rental expenses paid by MSSIPL to Majesco Limited for use of premises for the years ended March&nbsp;31, 2015 and March&nbsp;31, 2016 was $NIL and $ 1,066, respectively. Rental expenses paid by MSSIPL to Mastek Ltd. for use of premises for the years ended March&nbsp;31, 2015 and March&nbsp;31, 2016 was $NIL and $272, respectively.

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On September&nbsp;24, 2015, MSSIPL and Mastek (UK) Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of Mastek Ltd. (&#8220;Mastek UK&#8221;), entered into a Joint Venture Agreement (the &#8220;Agreement&#8221;) pursuant to which the two companies agreed to work together to deliver services to third parties under the terms of the Agreement, which services comprise the delivery of development, integration and support services to third parties by use of Mastek Ltd.&#8217;s development, integration and support methodologies and tools. The Agreement is effective September&nbsp;24, 2015 and will remain in force, unless terminated by either party upon three months&#8217; notice in writing to the other of its intention to terminate the Agreement. The consideration for each party&#8217;s performance of its obligations under the Agreement is the performance of the other&#8217;s obligations under the same Agreement, being services to the other. The services shall comprise in the case of Mastek Ltd., Mastek Ltd.&#8217;s development, integration and support methodologies and tools and business development services. In the case of MSSIPL, the services comprise the provision of leading edge technical expertise and advice. The parties will also exchange technical, business and other information.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On October&nbsp;31, 2015, Majesco Sdn. Bhd., a company incorporated under the laws of Malaysia and wholly-owned subsidiary of Majesco (&#8220;Majesco Malaysia&#8221;), entered into a Share Purchase Agreement with Mastek Ltd. pursuant to which Majesco Malaysia purchased from Mastek Ltd. all of the issued and outstanding shares of Mastek Asia Pacific Pte. Limited, a company incorporated under the laws of Singapore, for a total cash purchase consideration of 381,800 Singapore Dollars (USD $276,000). The acquisition closed on November&nbsp;1, 2015.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On December&nbsp;2, 2015, Majesco UK Limited, a company registered in England and Wales wholly owned by Majesco (&#8220;Majesco UK&#8221;), entered into a Services Agreement with Mastek UK, pursuant to which Mastek UK provides certain corporate and operational support services to Majesco UK, including managed office accommodation and facilities; managed office IT infrastructure and networks; and corporate support services, insurance coverage and subscription to professional associations and publications. The charges for these core services will consist of a monthly charge of 13,000 UK Pounds (USD $20,000) and a pass through of actual costs of providing the services. Any support services by Mastek UK staff not included in the core services will be charged on a basis to be determined separately between both parties but before provision of such services. Either party may at any time, by notice in writing to the other party, terminate this agreement for breach or if the other party becomes subject to insolvency issues. Either party for any reason or no reason may terminate this agreement by providing the
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:1PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	other party written notice of the termination ninety (90) days in advance. The Services Agreement contains customary representations, warranties and indemnities of the parties. The effective date of this Services Agreement is January&nbsp;1, 2015. The amount paid for the years ended March&nbsp;31, 2016 and March&nbsp;31, 2015 were $203 and $147 respectively.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On March&nbsp;1, 2016, Majesco, and Digility Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#8220;Digility&#8221;) wholly-owned by Mastek UK, entered into a Services Agreement (the &#8220;Services Agreement&#8221;), pursuant to which Majesco will provide certain management and operational support services to Digility, including managed office accommodation and facilities, managed office IT infrastructure and networks, and corporate support services.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The charges for these services will consist of an initial set-up fee of&#8201; $1,000, a monthly fee of&#8201; $3,750 and a pass through of actual costs of providing the services incurred in excess of the monthly fee. Either party may at any time, by notice in writing to the other party, terminate the Services Agreement for breach or if the other party becomes subject to insolvency issues. Either party for any reason or no reason may terminate the Services Agreement by providing the other party written notice of the termination thirty (30) days in advance. The Services Agreement contains customary representations, warranties and indemnities of the parties. The effective date of the Services Agreement is March&nbsp;1, 2016.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On March&nbsp;1, 2016, Majesco and Digility entered into a Sublease Agreement (the &#8220;Sublease Agreement&#8221;), pursuant to which Majesco will sublet the premises located on the first floor of 685 Route 202/206, Bridgewater, New Jersey to Digility. Digility will pay monthly $1,200 for rent to Majesco during the term of the Sublease Agreement. Digility will also reimburse Majesco for any costs charged by the landlord, Route 206 Associates, a New Jersey partnership, for additional services requested by Digility. The term of the Sublease Agreement will commence on March&nbsp;1, 2016 and expire on July&nbsp;31, 2017, unless terminated at an earlier date. Either party for any reason or no reason may terminate the Sublease Agreement by providing the other party written notice of the termination thirty (30) days in advance. The Sublease Agreement contains customary representations, warranties and indemnities of the parties.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; MARGIN-TOP:13PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	20
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:13PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:435.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SEGMENT INFORMATION
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The Group operates in one segment as software solutions provider for the insurance industry. The Group&#8217;s chief operating decision maker (the &#8220;CODM&#8221;) of the Group is the Chief Executive Officer. The CODM manages the Group&#8217;s operations on a consolidated basis for purposes of allocating resources. When evaluating the Group&#8217;s financial performance, the CODM reviews all financial information on a consolidated basis. Majority of the Group&#8217;s principal operations and decision-making functions are located in the United States.
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:12.99PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	We provide a significant volume of services to many customers. Therefore, a loss of a significant customer could materially reduce our revenues. The Group had one customer for the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2016, no customer for the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2015 and one customer for the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2014 that accounted for 10% or more of total revenue. The Group had one customer as of March&nbsp;31, 2016 and no customer as of March&nbsp;31, 2015 that accounted for 10% or more of total accounts receivables and unbilled accounts receivable. Presented in the table below is information about our major customer:
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Capital Commitments
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The Group had outstanding contractual commitments of&#8201; $842 and $81 as of March&nbsp;31, 2016 and 2015, respectively for capital expenditures relating to acquisition of property, equipment and new network infrastructure.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Operating Leases
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The Group leases certain office premises under operating leases. Many of these leases include a renewal option on a periodic basis at the Group&#8217;s option, with the renewal periods extending in the range of 2 &#8211; 5 years. Rental expense for operating leases amounted to $2,788, $2,379 and $2,040 for the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively. The schedule for future minimum rental payments over the lease term in respect of operating leases is set out below.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; MARGIN-TOP:16PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	22
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:16PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:435.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ACQUISITIONS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On December&nbsp;14, 2014, Majesco entered into a definitive merger agreement with Cover-All. The merger was completed on June&nbsp;26, 2015. Cover-All licenses and maintains software products for the property/casualty insurance industry throughout the United States and Puerto Rico. Majesco merged with Cover-All to expand its insurance business in the United States.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The following table summarizes the consideration paid in the merger of Cover-All into Majesco and the amounts of identified assets acquired and liabilities assumed at the merger date:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fair value of consideration transferred
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_57"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:416PT;HEIGHT:40.5000000000001PT;MARGIN-LEFT:20PT;MARGIN-TOP:7PT;BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE;">
<TR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#CCEEFF;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BOTTOM;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-VARIANT:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TD STYLE="PADDING:0PT; WIDTH:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING:0PT 0PT 1PT 0PT; WIDTH:371.29PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<DIV STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	Common stock
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING:0PT; WIDTH:6PT;">
	&#8203;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING:0PT; WIDTH:6PT;">
	&#8203;

	&#8203;

</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:11.39PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The merger of Cover-All and Majesco was a stock-for-stock merger with each share of Cover-All common stock issued and outstanding immediately prior to the merger converted into the right to receive the number of shares of Majesco common stock multiplied by the exchange ratio. The exchange ratio in the merger was 0.21641. Accordingly, at the closing of the merger, Cover-All in the aggregate represented 16.5% of the total capitalization of the combined company.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	In the merger, 5,844,830 shares of Majesco common stock were issued to the shareholders of Cover-All and 197,081 equity incentives were issued to the holders of options and restricted stock units of Cover-All. Consequently, common stock of Majesco is increased by $12 and additional paid in capital is increased by $29,708.
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:16PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:21.71PT;MARGIN-LEFT:70PT;WIDTH:456PT;">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:5PT; TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;">
	F-41
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:14.23PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The goodwill of&#8201; $18,020 arising from the merger consists largely of the synergies and economies of scale expected from combining the operations of Majesco and Cover-All. Further, though workforce has been valued, it is not recognized separately, but subsumed in goodwill. Goodwill deductible for tax purpose amounts to $NIL.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	On October&nbsp;31, 2015, Majesco Malaysia entered into a Share Purchase Agreement with Mastek Ltd. for the purchase of the issued and authorized shares of Mastek Asia Pacific Pte Limited, Singapore.
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:14.48PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	Revenues and earnings specific to the Cover-All business for the period June&nbsp;26, 2015 to June&nbsp;30, 2015 were $233 and $47, respectively. Revenues and earnings specific to the Cover-All business for the period July&nbsp;1, 2015 to March&nbsp;31, 2016 were $17,636 and $1,260, respectively.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pro-Forma Financial Information (Unaudited):
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The following unaudited proforma financial information is presented to illustrate the estimated effect of the Cover-All merger and Mastek Asia Pacific Pte. Limited acquisition, the related financing of funds and tax effects from these transactions. The unaudited proforma information for the periods set forth below gives effect to 2015 and 2014 transactions as if they had occurred as of April&nbsp;1, 2014. Majesco has a fiscal year end of March&nbsp;31st and Cover-All has a fiscal year end of December&nbsp;31st. The unaudited proforma financial information for the twelve months ended March&nbsp;31, 2016 and March&nbsp;31, 2015 reflects the Statement of Operations of Majesco for the twelve months ended March&nbsp;31, 2016 and March&nbsp;31, 2015 and Cover-All for the twelve months ended March&nbsp;31, 2016 and March&nbsp;31, 2015, respectively.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	The unaudited proforma financial information is presented for illustrative purposes only, and is not necessarily indicative of the financial condition or results of operations of future periods or the financial condition or results of operations that actually would have been realized had the entities been combined during the periods presented.
</DIV>
</DIV>

	F-43

	There are no material nonrecurring pro forma adjustments directly attributable to the merger included in the reported pro forma revenue and earnings. <DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; MARGIN-TOP:13PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	23

<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:13PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:435.5PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NON CONTROLLING INTEREST
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	As of March&nbsp;31, 2016, all the subsidiaries are 100% subsidiaries through direct and step down holdings and hence non-controlling interest is Nil.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	Till December&nbsp;2014, in case of Vector Insurance Services LLC (&#8216;Vector&#8217;), the Group held 90% equity interest in it. On January&nbsp;21, 2015, Vector had bought back 10% shares held by minority shareholders for a consideration of&#8201; $5. Subsequent to this buy-back, Vector signed an agreement of merger with Majesco dated February&nbsp;15, 2015. The said merger has been effected from March&nbsp;5, 2015 as per approval letter received from State of Indiana dated March&nbsp;5, 2015. This merger has no impact on the group&#8217;s financial position or results of its operations.
</DIV>

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Kind attention: Ms. Brindha Ramachandran
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Dear Sir/Madam:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We refer to your request and subsequent
	discussions you had with us regarding renewal of a Working Capital Limits for a total facility amount of USD 5,000,000.00 for your
	business requirements. ICICI Bank Limited, New York Branch (the &ldquo;Bank&rdquo;) is pleased to sanction to your company, Majesco
	(the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;) a Revolving Credit Facility to meet your working capital needs for a total facility amount of USD 5,000,000.00
	which shall be subject to the main terms and conditions given below and set out in Appendix-I hereto which are deemed to be part
	of this Credit Arrangement Letter (the &ldquo;Letter&rdquo;). The credit facility is also subject to conditions to be contained
	in the transaction documents which the Company shall execute with, and in favor of, the Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Upon signing this Letter, the Company shall
	pay upfront to the Bank the total amount of USD 50,000.00 (amounting to 1.00% p.a. of the total facility) as a processing fee for
	the aforesaid facility.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the attached terms of this Letter are
	acceptable to you, kindly confirm your agreement by signing the copy of this Letter together with the attachments (each page of
	which should be initialed on behalf of the Company) and returning them to us. The credit facility will be available on due execution
	of all loan and security documents. Those documents will include a requirement that your Board of Directors adopt resolutions approving,
	among other things, the proposed facility and the security granted therefor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Please note that this communication should
	not be construed as giving rise to any binding obligation on the part of the Bank until (i) you have returned the duplicate copy
	of this Letter duly signed to evidence acceptance thereof and (ii) signed / executed all of the agreements / documents in connection
	with the aforesaid credit facility.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Unless the Bank receives the attached,
	duplicate copy of this Letter, duly signed by you to indicate your acceptance hereof, within 15 days from the date of this Letter
	and unless all of the agreements / documents are signed / executed in respect of the credit facility within 60 days from the date
	of this Letter, the offer contained herein shall automatically lapse without any further communication from the Bank, unless the
	validity of the credit offer is expressly extended / revived by the Bank in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	basis.

<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Commitment Fee
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	0.25% p.a. of the unutilized amount, if the unutilized amount is more than USD 2.5 million, payable quarterly.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	13.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Processing fee
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	1.00% p.a. of the facility amount payable upfront.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	14.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Debt Servicing Reserve Account (DSRA)
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Borrower agrees to place before first drawdown date, whichever is earlier, a deposit in the form of DSRA with the Lender for the amount equaling to USD 0.20 million over the tenor of the facility.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	15.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Draw-down
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The amount shall be disbursed / drawn down
	in full or part, subject to a minimum of USD 100,000.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Disbursement / drawdown under the facility
	will be subject to a written request / notice of two working days in advance.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	16.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	Repayment Terms
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Amounts repaid will be available for further draw-down subject to being within the amount sanctioned and expiry
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
</TABLE>

	lists.

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Upon the occurrence of any event of default
	the Lender will be entitled to cancel the Facility and demand an immediate repayment of outstanding amount of the Facility and
	enforce the Security. The Lenders may at their discretion provide cure period not exceeding 15 days for non-payment / non bankruptcy
	related events of default that the Lender at its discretion may determine are capable of being cured.
</P>
</TD>

<B>
	Default Interest Rate
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	At all times during a default, principal, interest and any other outstanding amounts shall bear interest at a rate per annum equal to 2.00 % in excess of the applicable interest rate.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</TD>
</TR>

	financial commitments including all forms of guarantees are within the overall ceiling prescribed for overseas investment by the
	Indian party i.e. within 400 % of the net worth of the Indian party, if applicable.

<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_66"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 4%; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 23%; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Periodicity of submission of information to the Bank
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22%; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Receivables Statement
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 51%; BORDER: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The company will furnish on or before 15th day of the month, details of book debts in the prescribed format. The receivable statement needs to be certified by the company&rsquo;s management.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Un-audited quarterly financial statements
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Within 45 days of each calendar quarter end for the company signed by management.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Audited / unaudited financial statements
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	1. Provisional : within three months from
	the close of the accounting year
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	2. Audited : within six months from the
	close of the accounting year
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Data required for renewal of credit limits.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On or before the expiry of the credit limits.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Sole banking arrangements
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	All other terms and conditions shall be as per the Credit Facility Agreement (CFA) to be executed between the company and ICICI Bank Ltd.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
	Others
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT">
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Branch reserves the right to cancel
	the facility and demand full repayment of the outstanding facility within 90 days if the borrower, any of its group companies or
	directors of any group company are found to be on negative/restricted lists issued by agencies such as Office of Foreign Assets
	Control (part of US Treasury department), Securities &amp; Exchange Board of India, Reserve Bank of India, etc.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	CA Certificate that all the guidelines
	regarding Indian JV/WOS abroad have been followed/complied with it fall under the automatic route is to be provided.
</P>
</TD>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV STYLE=" WIDTH:595.3PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-VARIANT:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI, ARIAL, SANS-SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:8PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:46PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:49.71PT;MARGIN-LEFT:70PT;WIDTH:456PT;">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 31.1&#8203;
</DIV>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Certification of Chief Executive Officer of Majesco
<BR>
	Pursuant to Section 302 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:436PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	I, Ketan Mehta, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	1.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Majesco;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	2.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	3.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	4.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	a.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	b.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures, and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	c.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	5.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	a.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	b.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;

<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Certification of Chief Financial Officer of Majesco
<BR>
	Pursuant to Section 302 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:436PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	I, Farid Kazani, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	1.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Majesco;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	2.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	3.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	4.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	a.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	b.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:40PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	c.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.99PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:395.5PT;">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	5.

<EFX_EXHIBIT_32>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_32"></A>
<DIV STYLE=" WIDTH:595.3PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-VARIANT:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI, ARIAL, SANS-SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:8PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:46PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:49.71PT;MARGIN-LEFT:70PT;WIDTH:456PT;">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 32.1&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Statement of Chief Executive Officer
<BR>
	Pursuant to Section 1350 of Title 18 of the United States Code
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	Pursuant to Section 1350 of Title 18 of the United States Code as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned, Ketan Mehta, the President and Chief Executive Officer of Majesco (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), hereby certifies that based on the undersigned&#8217;s knowledge:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	1.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s annual report on Form 10-K for the period ended March&nbsp;31, 2016 (the &#8220;Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	2.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;

<DIV STYLE=" WIDTH:595.3PT;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-VARIANT:NORMAL;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI, ARIAL, SANS-SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:8PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:46PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:49.71PT;MARGIN-LEFT:70PT;WIDTH:456PT;">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 32.2&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Statement of Chief Financial Officer
<BR>
	Pursuant to Section 1350 of Title 18 of the United States Code
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:20PT; MARGIN-TOP:6PT; WIDTH:456PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT;">
	Pursuant to Section 1350 of Title 18 of the United States Code as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, the undersigned, Farid Kazani, the Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer of Majesco (the &#8220;Company&#8221;), hereby certifies that based on the undersigned&#8217;s knowledge:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	1.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The Company&#8217;s annual report on Form 10-K for the period ended March&nbsp;31, 2016 (the &#8220;Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-LEFT:20PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:20PT;WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP;">
	2.
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE=" FLOAT:LEFT; MARGIN-TOP:8.98PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; LINE-HEIGHT:12PT; TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT; WIDTH:415.5PT;">
	The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="CLEAR:BOTH; PADDING:0PT; MARGIN:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:0PT;">
	&#8203;
</DIV>
